name: Titipku
headline: Super Hyperlocal Marketplace for SMEs in Indonesia
description: Local market is a traditional wet market that consist with 200 - 1000 merchants who sell groceries located in every residential area. We  digitize all these merchants into our apps and provide personal shoppers. So every household can buy groceries from multiple merchants at one local market in one single order. There are 16.000 local markets in Indonesia with 8.000.000 merchants inside.

founders.name: Henri Suhardja, Founder
founders.description:
2nd time entrepreneur & Angel Investor in some food MSMEs.

A food technologist graduate, experienced in entrepreneurship for the last 8 years by having small business and also invest in some small business.

founders.name: Ong Tek Tjan, Founder
founders.description: I was born in Padang Indonesia year 1969. I have working experience mostly in banking sector for more than 26 years such BCA, Bank Danamon, Bank Sahabat Sampoerna. Handled SME and Commercial segments,   managed branches, sales teams, strategic planning, product developments, for example  financial supply chain system, credit origination system, digital saving, cross selling among subsidiaries.

Belanja Pasar Masa Kini
Layanan
[Promo](https://titipku.com/</promo>)[Resep](https://titipku.com/</resep>)[Blog](https://titipku.com/<https:/titipku.com/blog>)[Berita](https://titipku.com/</news>)
# Belanja Lengkap dan Segar dari Pasar
## Jatiper Titipku siap membelikan semua pesananmu!
Belanja Sekarang!
![Play](https://titipku.com)
“Seneng banget ada Titipku yang bisa membantu UMKM dan menghubungkan kita sama para pedagang di pasar tradisional, barangnya juga segar karena dari pasar.”
Ernest Prakasa, Standup Comedian, Film Director
“Belanja di Titipku praktis, beli dari banyak pedagang cuma sekali checkout. Barangnya fresh, tepat waktu & hemat.”
Tina Toon, Penyanyi
“Sayurnya segar, produknya lengkap karena di pasar semua ada. Praktis banget titip belanja ke pasar pake Titipku.”
Maudy Koesnaedi, Aktris
“Saya belanja pakai Titipku membantu pasar lokal yang ada dengan produk yang fresh setiap hari.”
Chef Desi Trisnawati, Masterchef Season 2
“Suka Titipku karena ini marketplace yang isinya 100% UMKM Indonesia, harga yang dikasih juga langsung dari penjual. Thank you Titipku for making this happen!”
Joanna Alexander, Aktris
![Keunggulan Titipku](https://titipku.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fimg-tangan-d870808cd27d0b90e5604a36bdb83a07.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Kenapa Belanja di Titipku
![Gratis Ongkir Tiap Hari](https://titipku.com)
### Gratis Ongkir Tiap Hari
Belanja dari pasar jadi lebih mudah dan hemat pakai Titipku. Coba sekarang dan rasakan kemudahannya!
![Garansi Produk Segar](https://titipku.com)
### Garansi Produk Segar
Kami berkomitmen untuk memberikan produk terbaik. Ada garansi produk setiap kamu belanja!
![Produk Pasti Lengkap](https://titipku.com)
### Produk Pasti Lengkap
Temukan 900RB+ pilihan produk dari 6RB+ lapak di Titipku. Praktis, tanpa keluar rumah!
![Bantu UMKM go digital](https://titipku.com)
### Bantu UMKM go digital
Tiap belanja di Titipku, kamu telah mendukung pertumbuhan digital UMKM!
![](https://titipku.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fjamkirim-f1c1088705af37538a2f5809b6c613e7.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Diantar Hari Ini atau Besok? Bisa!
Pesan belanjaan lebih praktis karena bisa pilih waktu pengiriman sesuai yang kamu mau! Nikmati pengalaman belanja online yang lebih mudah dan fleksibel dari Titipku.
![](https://titipku.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Fchat-c41d740199579c038b491b60b4b16c7f.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Pesanan Dibelanjakan Jatiper Terlatih
Jatiper adalah Shopper terlatih kami yang siap membelanjakan dan mengantar pesananmu sampai ke rumah. Jatiper Titipku memiliki sertifikasi dan standar operasional yang ketat. Andalan banget pokoknya!
![](https://titipku.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fimages%2Flapakbanyak-cb56eaed8e3f56d9cc9a4f1cdc5afe53.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Belanja di Banyak Lapak, Ongkirnya Gak Bengkak!
Cukup sekali transaksi, bisa belanja dari berbagai lapak di pasar. Jadi hemat karena sekali checkout. Sekarang gak perlu pusing mikirin ongkir lagi, deh...
Lengkap & Segarnya Produk Pasar Kini dalam Genggaman!
1
Kebutuhan sehari-hari dari pasar langganan atau supermarket kesayangan, lebih beragam pilihannya di Titipku!
2
Tinggal pilih produknya, masukkan ke keranjang, tentukan waktu pengriman sesukamu, langsung bayar dengan metode yang kamu mau!
3
Pesanan dibelanjakan dan diantar oleh Jatiper sampai ke rumah, praktis dan makin aman karena ada garansinya!
## Buktikan belanja jadi lebih hemat dan praktis pakai Titipku!
[](https://titipku.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.titipku.alpha&hl=en>)[](https://titipku.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/id/app/titipku/id1589789782>)
![Aplikasi Titipku](https://titipku.com)
## Titip Belanja Sayuran dan Daging Online dari Pasar Hanya di Titipku
Titipku adalah aplikasi belanja online yang hadir untuk memberikan kemudahan bagi para ibu rumah tangga untuk memenuhi kebutuhan sembako, sayur, buah, hingga daging segar lewat pengalaman Belanja Pasar Online.

generated_description:
**Titipku: Bridging Tradition and Modernity in Indonesia's Grocery Market**

Founded in 2017 and hailing from Jakarta, Indonesia, **Titipku** is carving out a niche as a super hyperlocal marketplace designed specifically for small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in the country's vibrant grocery sector. Initially rooted in the classic traditional wet market model—where anywhere between 200 to 1,000 merchants sell groceries in every neighborhood—Titipku is digitizing this entire ecosystem. Essentially, they are bringing old-school market shopping into the modern digital era.

Here’s how it works: through the Titipku app, households can conveniently shop from various merchants within a local market, placing single orders for groceries sourced from multiple sellers. It’s a powerful concept when you consider there are 16,000 local markets across Indonesia, hosting around 8 million merchants. Titipku is tapping into a massive and often underrepresented segment of the retail market.

As a graduate of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Titipku has the guidance of industry leaders, including their group partner, Gustaf Alstromer. Growth is tangible, with a dedicated team of 19 employees driving operations and customer engagement.

What makes Titipku particularly appealing is its clear commitment to both consumer convenience and support for local entrepreneurs. The platform guarantees fresh products, offers free shipping, and ensures a vast selection with over 900,000 product choices from 6,000 different stalls. You can even schedule your delivery to suit your needs—a feature that adds a level of flexibility apparently rare in traditional grocery shopping.

The testimonials from users, including notable Indonesian figures, spotlight the positive impact of Titipku. Customers appreciate the practicality of being able to shop from multiple vendors in one go, receiving fresh products, and ultimately supporting local businesses going digital. 

Titipku is not just another delivery app; it's a platform that acknowledges the value of community interaction in shopping. In supporting local merchants, the company is also fostering the digital growth of Indonesia’s SME sector. 

You can explore their offerings by visiting [Titipku’s website](https://titipku.com). If you’re in Indonesia and want fresher groceries delivered efficiently, they could very well be your go-to marketplace. After all, grocery shopping doesn’t have to be a hassle; with Titipku, it’s a breeze.
